3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Regina Jacobs - 510-693-7973 - New Listing. Thoughtfully remodeled Glenview Craftsman with original architectural details. The experience begins in the large light-filled living room, with banks of windows, period trim molding and classic built-in cabinetry. The perched location invites privacy and enables a maximum of sunlight. The spacious formal dining room is perfect for large gatherings and French doors lead out to a spacious patio. Entertainers will delight at the easy connection to the tastefully remodeled chef’s kitchen. French doors in the kitchen open out to a stone patio and professionally landscaped backyard creating an enviable indoor-outdoor connection. A half bath, perfect for guests, completes the main floor. The upper-level features three bedrooms and a newly remodeled bathroom. The backyard is an urban oasis with a level lawn area and mature plants and trees. A path meanders through the garden to a charming, detached studio, ideal as a home office or writer's studio. Convenient to Glenview's shops and restaurants.

Remarks: Claudia Mills - 510-350-6419 - Brought to you by the noted design-build team Millennium Living Space, this stunning four-bedroom and three-and-a-half-bathroom property defines modern living. Newly renovated, the home has been thoughtfully modernized with state-of-the-art upgrades, stunning designer details, and bespoke custom features. The main level features connected living, kitchen, and dining areas, an ensuite bedroom and accordion doors from the dining area to a large rear deck. Up a short flight of stairs is the primary level, with multiple balconies, steam shower, soaking tub, and walk-in closet. The mezzanine levels lead you to a full bathroom, powder room, interior access from the garage, and an additional bedroom. The lowest level features a family room with french doors out to the garden, a laundry room, and a bedroom. The charming garden features a lawn with custom gate & access the creek and hillside beyond, making it feel as if you were in a fairytale. The best of both worlds, the home is positioned near the trendy boutiques and restaurants on Lakeshore and Grand, while the Trestle Glen neighborhood feels charmingly suburban.  A once-in-a-lifetime opportunity, 1400 Trestle Glen is an achievement of high-quality construction and artful design.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Anne Feste - Agt: 510-757-4787 - Such a great home that it was once my own! Welcome to 1116 Mandana Boulevard, a 3br/2.5ba Spanish style home located in Crocker Highlands. Just a few steps to the front door, this home offers single level living and low maintenance landscaping. I have always loved the light in this home, every room is bright and welcoming. Both the living, dining and family rooms feature dramatic windows and the family room and primary bedroom both feature sliding glass doors. Wonderful bedroom equity, with the primary suite privately tucked away connecting to the deck and the other two bedrooms sharing the hallway bath. Newer Kitchenaid appliances, Meile washer and dryer, a Haiku fan, dual pane windows, and copper exterior detailing are just a few of the wonderful improvements this home features. Oak trees surround the private deck, creating a peaceful outdoor retreat. Ample off street parking and a large detached garage with a portion converted for home office or storage needs. Located just blocks from award winning schools and nearby wonderful dining, shopping, and local businesses along Grand and Lakeshore.

Remarks: Jill Carrigan - Agt: 510-388-2585 -  Located on the most desirable and picturesque street in Crocker Highlands this exquisitely designed English Traditional home invites you to experience a fusion of Old World charm and Parisian flat chic.Warm natural light streams through the living room framing views of blooming roses and lush lawn.The grand room epitomizes the beauty of 1920s architecture with high ceilings brick fireplace & adjoining sunroom - accessing an expansive private deck the perfect extension of the home to host summer night soirées. Recently updated with the most current designer finishes and top-of-the-line appliances the sun-filled kitchen & its cozy breakfast nook are ideal spots sit and share.The floor plan is thoughtfully designed for privacy. All three spacious bedrooms are located upstairs -The primary suite being a true sanctuary! A glamorous space with a fireplace and its own lounge that accesses a romantic balcony and hillside views.The office is located on the lower level with easy access to the lovely backyard.The private gardens alive with blooms towering redwoods and verdant lawn offer a serene escape. Minutes to Park Blvd to top-rated restaurants gourmet groceries &  the TransBay Bus–straight to the city. So, relax have a glass of wine watch the butterflies and settle in. You are home!
Confidential Remarks: Offers on Wednesday 6.26 by noon.  RELO- please allow 24 hours for offer response. Open Say & Sun 2-4:00 Neither Agents nor Sellers have verified the square footage.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: David Higgins - Cell: 510-390-6929 - Timeless elegance meets modern sophistication in this Crocker Highlands jewel. Dwell inspired eat-in kitchen, w/stainless appliances, stone counters, artisan tile accents, subway tile surrounds, custom lighting & matte gold accents. A true culinary haven ideal for the most discerning chef & fortunate guests. Spacious living room anchored by wood burning fireplace w/doors onto the tranquil terrace overlooking Trestle Glen, ideal for morning coffee or evening glass of wine. Split-level floor plan w/well-proportioned hall bath, double vanity & designer finishes, stunning 2nd bath with frameless glass shower, & a dedicated laundry closet. Private rear grounds & gardens w/space to entertain, relax including a 2nd deck off the kitchen for dining alfresco in upcoming spring & summer evenings. Oversized attached garage w/additional storage space, plus structural system updates including newer copper plumbing, house fan, air conditioning, new hot water heater & PSL compliance certificate. Located just blocks from the vibrant Lakeshore Ave shops & restaurants for dining, shopping & entertainment. The award-winning elementary school is just minutes away, + quick access to the Bay Bridge to SF, Lake Merritt & the Grand/Lake Saturday Farmer Market.
Confidential Remarks: Square footage on MLS is derived from public records. Neither Seller nor Listing Agent has verified the accuracy of any of these sources of information.

Confidential Remarks: For showings, please call Showingtime at 800-746-9464. Disclosure link: https://app.disclosures.io/link/866-Alma-Place-rqc6nif1 Escrow opened with Sailbridge Closing. Offers due on 9/28 by 11am.
Public Remarks: Charming mid-century Crocker Highlands home on a tree lined cul-de-sac. Upon entering the freshly painted home, the warm hardwood floors will greet you leading to the living room with a wood burning fireplace. Stroll past the dining area, the heart of the home, the kitchen. Enjoy cooking in this private kitchen with a stunning view of trees and sunset. A main level master suite, additional bedroom and bath round out the main level. The lower level features another master suite, an additional bedroom, full bath, family room and a kitchen that opens up to a large deck perfect for family gatherings and entertaining. Improvements include refinished hardwood floors, Elfa closets, newer roof, newer furnace, ducts with 2-zones and Nest Thermostats, updated deck and new concrete slab. The newly sodded front yard with an irrigation system will be a bonus for your four-legged friends. Two car garage with cabinet storage. Blocks from shops and dining on Park Boulevard, Lakeshore & Grand.
